TextView.android:text: Chapter 2: The Major Battles and Turning Points\n\nThe war saw several crucial battles that shaped its course. The Battle of Britain (1940) prevented a German invasion of the UK. The invasion of the Soviet Union in 1941 led to the brutal Battle of Stalingrad, a turning point in the Eastern Front. Meanwhile, the attack on Pearl Harbor (December 7, 1941) drew the United States into the war. The D-Day invasion (June 6, 1944) marked the beginning of the liberation of Western Europe.
